fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Find Meat**: Give the Minecraft(Head) role one Meat.
**Milked Cow**: Get milked, giving the Minecraft(Head) role one Milk.
**Farm Leather**: Give the Minecraft(Head) role one Leather.
**Flee**: Flee from a player, causing them to target you tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you die, the Minecraft(Head) role gains one Meat, Milk, and Leather.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear
